cells.content:
**Notes**

* Capital letter is Keyword
* smallcase is user intervention
* [] is optional

* NX works if the key doesn't exist
* SETNX does the same thing

SET message hello
SET message world NX
* XX works if the key already exist

* EX set the expiry of a key
* SETEX does the same thing

SET message hello EX 2
SETEX message 2 hello
GET message
* On Trying after 2 seconds, it shoulde be deleted

* MSET used to set multiple key at once
* MSETNX used to set multiple key if the don't exist

MSET firstName Rishi lastName Singh
MSETNX middleName1 Rishi middleName2 New
* MGET used to get multiple keys
* DEL deletes the key, and data related to it

SET firstName Rishi
GET firstName
DEL firstName
GET firstName

* GETRANGE gets the portion of the string
* SET RANGE update the portion of the string

SET name Rishi
GETRANGE name 0 2
SETRANGE name 1 ahul
GET name
